name: Blood of the Mutineers
overview:
This superb text adventure from Robico is the first in a series of stories featuring that scourge of the seas, Captain Blizzard!

Whilst in search of the treasure of the Great Skull Temple, Blizzard is confronted by his mutinous crew who are set on taking the booty for themselves! The Captain is forced to draw upon his iron will, calm intellect, skillful seamanship and devious resourcefulness to evade the frenzied sailors and claim the treasure as his own!
